name: priwatt-env-switcher
description: Toggle WordPress environment blocks inside .env files directly from the VS Code status bar.

priwattEnvSwitcher.envSwitcherFile.description: Path to the env file containing Priwatt WordPress endpoints. Relative paths resolve from the first workspace folder; supports ~/ expansion.

priwattEnvSwitcher.showEnvSwitcher.description: Show the environment switcher status bar button
